author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The purpose of this PR is to introduce some more needed monitoring plots to the module `DiMuonVertexMonitor`  introduced at 
and add unit test to the  `DQMOffline/Alignment package`

#### PR validation:

Relies on running the introduced unit tests.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, but I will backport it to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38425
title: Introduce more plots in `DiMuonVertexMonitor` and add unit tests
